NamePattern.description: The pattern to filter data by name.

Active.description: The optional filter for active or inactive data.

Status.description: The optional filter for data status.

UseCaseId.description: The optional filter for use case identifier.

PageNumber.description: The optional page number for pagination.

PageSize.description: The optional page size for pagination.

OrderBy.description: The optional property to order the results by.

OrderDirection.description: The optional direction for ordering the results (ascending or descending).

ExternalId.description: The optional filter for the external data identifier.

DeletedDate.description: The optional filter for the external data deleted date.

ReturnSource.description: The optional filter for retornable or not retornable data.
